entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few showers beginning early in the morning and ending near noon then 40 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 near Haro Strait late in the morning and in the afternoon. High 7. Forecast issued 12:42 AM PST Monday 09 January 2023
